home.title: TickFlow - Elegant Online Clock
home.subtitle: A clean and beautiful web clock application that makes time display a pleasure.

analog.title: Analog Clock
analog.description: Classic analog clock display with multiple dial styles and smooth hand animations.

digital.title: Digital Clock
digital.description: Clear digital time display with 12/24 hour format switching.

timezone.title: Multiple Timezones
timezone.description: Support for major time zones worldwide, easily view time in different regions.

about.title: About
about.description: TickFlow is an open-source online clock application dedicated to providing an elegant time display experience.
